title: Product Identifier Generator
description: We want the PIM to be responsible for creating unique product identifiers on the fly when importing/creating new products, based on nomenclatures.

title: Several Product Identifiers for One Product
description: We want to allow the use of several identifiers because in most cases, both GTIN and SKU are needed. Some of you even use an internal identifier in addition to those two.

title: Product Identifier other than SKU
description: Today, we provide one product identifier named `sku`. It can be a bit too restrictive as some of you use other identifiers such as GTIN for example. Let's make it possible for you to choose a different naming!

title: Import/Export Automation
description: SaaS users need to automate their imports and exports directly from the PIM. We are looking into making it available for product information in XLSX and CSV format.
